title: New: Ed Thomas â€“ Hurt
body:
Having impressed on his debut solo track On My Own, previous Bondax writer and Chase & Status collaborator Ed Thomas drops another cut, entitled Hurt.

Smoother and equally as refined as his debut, this is future R&B, and it sounds fantastic. Art by Samuel Johnson
